title: Making The Case For Beef
teaser: Cattle not only provide invaluable nutrition, but they also offer a solution to climate change according to Joy Cardin’s guest, who is the author of “Defending Beef: The Case For Sustainable Meat Production". Joy will talk to the author, who is an environmental lawyer, rancher, and long-time vegetarian, about how, no matter what the future of the food system is, beef must be a part of it.
